feed.title: Improving Payment Latency by Fast Forwards

entry.title: Improving Payment Latency by Fast Forwards
entry.summary: In a mailing list, ZmnSCPxj has shared a link to a presentation that explains the concept of fast-forwards. The presentation is intended for both semi-technical and technical people who have not fully understood the original writeup in 2019. ZmnSCPxj has promised to make a convenient presentation for better understanding. The presentation uses callouts extensively for explication and can be accessed by simply running it (F5 in LibreOffice). The link to the presentation is https://zmnscpxj.github.io/offchain/2021-06-fast-forwards.odp.
